content:
# The items have been successfully inserted into the stone furnace. The furnace is currently processing 15 units of iron ore and has produced 3 iron plates.
#
# We need to wait for the smelting process to complete again. Let's implement a loop to monitor the output of the furnace for up to 30 seconds.

for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds
    # Inspect the furnace inventory to check how many iron plates have been produced
    furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  
    iron_plates = furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0)  # Check how many iron plates have been produced
    
    if iron_plates >= 5:  # We need at least 5 iron plates to craft the gear wheel and assembling machine
        print(f"Smelting completed! Total produced: {iron_plates} iron plates.")
        break
    
    sleep(1)  # Wait for one second
else:
    print("Smelting timeout - check fuels and inputs.")  # If it didn't finish in time.
